name: BlueVRed
description:
BlueVRed is simple top-down-shooter based on two colors. Your only job is to survive as long as possible and beat highscore.

After killing an enemy there is a chance to get ability, but stroger ones are harder to get.

BlueVRed gives you 3 game modes to choose from:

-Normal, where you aim with your mouse.

-Locked is much harder, you will always face center of the screen. In order to aim you have to use movement.

In options you can choose one of 4 difficulties, but you will propably play on impossible.

Remember, red will always win!

Hope you'll have fun playing it!

Music in trailer: Next Steps by half.cool https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtkVGyrwbsvv0yU6Hn5RG4A
